doc.field: Typescripts: "The Struggle for a Democratic Spain," JB and Al Kent; "Brief Resume on Veterans of the ALB," JB; "US Investments in Spain," Victor Perle (1961); "Origin and Cause of the People's War against Fascism in Spain…," two lectures given at People's School for Marxist Studies (1983); "The Revolt of the Fascist Military"; "Spain: End of the Franco Era?," JB (1963) Franklin D. Roosevelt, copied excerpt from a statement on Spain (during WWII); various statements on U.S. relations with post-SCW Spain; VALB bulletins Pamphlet: Speech given by Enrique Carlos de la Casa, Jul 19, 1937 Articles on U.S. and the Franco regime
